message: Hello Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product to you. Given its exceptional value and quality, we believe it would be a great addition to your collection. We are offering this remarkable item to you for $10,000. We hope this price aligns well with your expectations and allows us to facilitate this transaction.

Alice, thank you for the offer.  While I appreciate the quality of your product,  $10,000 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable with at this time. I'm willing to pay $8,500 for it.  Let me know if that works for you.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and appreciate your interest in our product. In light of your offer, I am proposing a counteroffer of $9,000 for the product. This price reflects the value we place on it while still being competitive with your offer. I hope this proposal is more in line with what you're considering.
